name: Spiced Brown Sugar Syrup
description: Brown sugar brings a deeper, richer flavor to a simple syrup than white sugar. Infused with clove and cinnamon, it’s perfect for winter cocktails.
keywords: brown sugar, cinnamon stick, cloves, winter
recipeIngredient: 3 cinnamon sticks, broken into smaller pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, combine all ingredients with 1 cup water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes until sugar has completely dissolved, stirring occasionally.
Remove pan from heat and let the syrup cool. Strain syrup into a clean jar; discard solids. May be refrigerated for a week.
